title: Girl, 9, shot in Barrow County
content:
BARROW COUNTY, Ga. – A 9-year-old girl was shot by a man who said he was cleaning his gun Monday, authorities in Barrow County said.
According to Barrow County Sheriff Jud Smith, the incident happened at 881 Highway 82 off of Giles Road. The man told police he was cleaning his gun when he accidentally shot his girlfriend's daughter.
The girl was shot in the side and and flown to Children's Healthcare of Atlanta at Egleston in Atlanta in stable condition.
No charges have been filed. Police are continuing to question the man.
